description: This file defines data classes representing the result of a move in a 2048 puzzle game, including steps for movement, merging, spawning new tiles, and overall move outcome summaries.

classes.name: MoveStep
classes.description: Represents a single tile movement from one position to another.

classes.name: MergeStep
classes.description: Represents a merge of two tiles into a new tile at a specific position.

classes.name: SpawnInfo
classes.description: Describes a newly spawned tile on the game board.

classes.name: MoveResult
classes.description: Encapsulates the entire outcome of a move, including steps, merges, spawns, score, and game state flags.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Provides a string representation of the respective class instances.

methods.name: empty
methods.description: Creates a default MoveResult instance indicating no changes, with specified win/lose status.
